sentence.text: By analyzing public data sets of gene expression in human breast cancers we observed that increased levels of transcripts encoding the planar cell polarity (biological_process) proteins cell proliferation and Wnt signaling pathway, planar cell polarity pathway correlate with increased risk of patient relapse.

entity.text: Wnt signaling pathway, planar cell polarity pathway

sentence.text: To investigate SCRIB-associated proteins that might participate in the responses of breast cancer cells to altered levels of SCRIB, we used cell adhesion mediated by integrin spectrometry and confocal microscopy.

Focusing on postsynaptic actin cytoskeleton organization, we observed that NOS1AP colocalizes with both cell proliferation and VANGL1 along cellular protrusions in metastatic breast cancer cells, but does not colocalize with either SCRIB or VANGL1 at cell junctions in normal breast cells.

We investigated the effects of shRNA-mediated knockdown of postsynaptic actin cytoskeleton organization and cell proliferation in vitro, and found that reducing NOS1AP and SCRIB slows breast cancer cell migration and prevents the establishment of leading-trailing polarity.
